commit.message:
Also handle ARRAY_REFs in instantiate_scev_r.

2010-08-20  Sebastian Pop  <sebastian.pop@amd.com>

	* tree-scalar-evolution.c (instantiate_array_ref): New.
	(instantiate_scev_r): Also handle ARRAY_REFs.

From-SVN: r164790
